text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://id.who.int/icd/entity
    CodeDisplay
    X68M6vacunas COVID-19
    XM1AU2Sinopharm WIBP-CorV
    XM1G90Covaxin
    XM1NL1Vacunas contra COVID-19, virus inactivado
    XM3DT5Vacuna COVID-19 Moderna
    XM4YL8Vacuna contra COVID-19 AstraZeneca
    XM5JC5Vacunas contra COVID-19, subunidad proteica del virus
    XM5QM6Sputnik-Light
    XM5ZJ4Gam-Covid-Vac
    XM6AT1COVID-19 vaccine, DNA based
    XM6QV1Vacuna contra COVID-19 Janssen
    XM6SZ8EpiVacCorona
    XM7HT3CoronaVac®
    XM8NQ0Comirnaty®
    XM97N6QazVac
    XM97T2Covishield®
    XM9QW8Vacunas contra COVID-19, vector viral no replicante
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct/449081005
    CodeDisplay
    1157024006vacuna virus entero inactivado contra SARS-CoV-2

    33451000087108QazCovid-in vacuna COVID-19 virus entero inactivado
